evidence_example.title: Uart polling (blocking mode) test demo
evidence_example.small_descr: This is the demo to test Uart polling (blocking mode) on FPG-EYE Board devices.
evidence_example.long_descr:
Uart polling test(blocking mode).

This demo shows how to use UART driver for Lattice Mico32 device to send and receive characters.

The UART controller is configured in polling mode and in blocking mode so it waits one character when task calls EE_uart_receive_byte and it waits 5 characters when task calls EE_uart_receive_buffer.

In case of error the application turns on the system led.

The demo requires a RS232 serial connection with a 115200 bps, 8N1 configuration.
